scripts.seed: mongosh competency --eval 'printjson(db.dropDatabase())' && mongoimport --db=competency --collection=scriptures --file=seed/scrip_seed.json && mongoimport --db=competency --collection=encourages --file=seed/encourage_seed.json && mongoimport --db=competency --collection=users --file=seed/user_seed.json && mongoimport --db=competency --collection=studies --file=seed/study_seed.json && mongoimport --db=competency --collection=charities --file=seed/charity_seed.json
